Defend the Hornburg against the White Hand
The forces of the White Hand are attacking the Hornburg. Aid the Rohirrim against their enemy.

'Alas, my good friend and retainer has fallen...but with his sacrifice, he proved that any accusations against his honour were without base. Let us take his body from this place, lest it be forgotten upon the field....'
'Hurry, my friend...the wall is breached, and we must defend the Hornburg! Enemies are making for the Glittering Caves of Aglarond!'
